Package de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization

Provides the classes necessary for running the Synchronization process and the classes for every database table which is to be Synchronized with the Sync Server.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseStation
    This class is used to store the data received/pulled from main server.
    BaseStationSync
    This class is used for handling synchronization of base station tables in database.
    Beta
    Creates a Beta object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a Beta Table in Database.
    BetaSync
    Synchronizes beta value in the Local Database with the Server.
    ConfigurationParameter
    Creates a ConfigurationParameter object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.configParametersTable in Database.
    ConfigurationParameterSync
    Synchronizes configuration paramters (internal parameters) in the Local Database with the Server.
    DeviceList
    Creates a Device list object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.deviceListTable Table in Database.
    FixedStation
    Creates a Fixed station object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable Table in Database.
    FixedStationSync
    Synchronizes fixed station database table parameters in the Local Database with the Server.
    SampleMeasurement
    Creates a Sample Measurement object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.sampleMeasurementTable Table in Database.
    SampleMeasurementSync
    Pushes sample and measurement table parameters in the Local Database to the Server.
    StaticStation
    Creates a Static Station object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.staticStationListTable Table in Database.
    StaticStationSync
    Pushes Static Station table parameters in the Local Database to the Server.
    StationList
    Creates an AIS Station object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.stationListTable Table in Database.
    StationListSync
    Pushes AIS Station table parameters in the Local Database to the Server.
    SyncActivity
    This Activity runs the Synchronization Process between the App and the Sync Server.
    Users
    Creates an Admin User object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.usersTable Table in Database.
    UsersSync
    Pushes User table parameters in the Local Database to the Server.
    Waypoints
    Creates a Waypoinot object with getters and setters for all the parameters of a DatabaseHelper.waypointsTable Table in Database.
    WaypointsSync
    Pushes Waypoint table parameters in the Local Database to the Server.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization Description

Provides the classes necessary for running the Synchronization process and the classes for every database table which is to be Synchronized with the Sync Server. The Synchronization processes uses RequestQueue, StringRequest XmlPullParser to transfer data between the Sync Server and the App.

For each Database table which is to be Synchronized there are two classes. A class which contains all the parameters (columns) of each database table to be synchronized and another class which provides methods for creating the Push and Pull requests and adding those requests to the RequestQueue. An android activity (SyncActivity) is used for running the Overall synchronization process.

See Also:
RequestQueue, StringRequest, XmlPullParser, XmlPullParserFactory
